Plot: Chris wants to show girlfriend Tina his world, but events soon conspire against the couple and their dream caravan holiday takes a very wrong turn.
Title: Sightseers
Writer: Alice Lowe, Steve Oram, Amy Jump (additional material)
Actors: Alice Lowe, Eileen Davies, Steve Oram, Roger Michael
tomatoConsensus: Director Ben Wheatley and writer-stars Alice Lowe and Steve Oram deliver a wicked road trip movie that successfully walks the line between dark comedy and horror.
